answers.answer: Hello,I think you should see your doctor.  Maybe an infection / could it be an ear infection affecting your balance?Are your sugars usually this high?  193 is high, though not catastrophic.Are you on any meds for blood sugar or other?Keep well hydrated (drink plenty of fluids / water).  Don't take carbs or anything sweet at the moment.Let us know how you go.

Sally is correct, you need to go see a doctor. We cannot see or exam you over the Internet. If you seek assistance with lowering your blood sugars you need to provide us with more information -• Name and dosage of your diabetes medication/s• How often you test your blood sugars• Your last A1c result• What lifestyle changes you have made in order to control and manage your diabetes• What your diet consist of• When you last had a thorough health exam

question: blood sugar is 193.  I have been lighthead this evening. don't feel like I can stay balanced standing up.
title: diabetes
